andfn.dfn.Fracture¶

class andfn.dfn.Fracture(label, t, radius, center, normal, ncoef=5, nint=10, elements=None, **kwargs)[source]¶
__init__(label, t, radius, center, normal, ncoef=5, nint=10, elements=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Initializes the fracture class. :param label: The label of the fracture. :type label: str :param t: The transmissivity of the fracture. :type t: float :param radius: The radius of the fracture. :type radius: float :param center: The center of the fracture. :type center: np.ndarray :param normal: The normal vector of the fracture. :type normal: np.ndarray :param ncoef: The number of coefficients for the bounding circle that bounds the fracture. :type ncoef: int :param nint: The number of integration points for the bounding circle that bounds the fracture. :type nint: int :param elements: A list of elements that the fracture is associated with. If elements is None the bounding circle will be

created.

Parameters:

kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Methods

__init__(label, t, radius, center, normal[, ...])

Initializes the fracture class. :param label: The label of the fracture. :type label: str :param t: The transmissivity of the fracture. :type t: float :param radius: The radius of the fracture. :type radius: float :param center: The center of the fracture. :type center: np.ndarray :param normal: The normal vector of the fracture. :type normal: np.ndarray :param ncoef: The number of coefficients for the bounding circle that bounds the fracture. :type ncoef: int :param nint: The number of integration points for the bounding circle that bounds the fracture. :type nint: int :param elements: A list of elements that the fracture is associated with. If elements is None the bounding circle will be created. :type elements: list :param kwargs: Additional keyword arguments. :type kwargs: dict.

add_element(new_element)

Adds a new element to the fracture.

calc_flow_net(n_points[, margin])

Calculates the flow net for the fracture.

calc_omega(z[, exclude])

Calculates the omega for the fracture excluding element "exclude".

calc_w(z[, exclude])

Calculates the complex discharge vector for the fracture excluding element "exclude".

check_discharge()

Checks so the discharge in the fracture adds up to zero.

consolidate()

Consolidates the fracture into a structured array. :returns: * fracture_struc_array (np.ndarray) -- The structured array for the fracture. * fracture_index_array (np.ndarray) -- The structured array for the fracture index.

consolidate_hpc()

Consolidates the fracture into a structured array for HPC. :returns: * fracture_struc_array (np.ndarray) -- The structured array for the fracture. * fracture_index_array (np.ndarray) -- The structured array for the fracture index.

get_discharge_elements()

Returns the elements in the fracture that have a discharge.

get_discharge_entries()

Returns the elements in the fracture that have a discharge.

get_max_min_head()

Returns the maximum and minimum head from the constant head elements for the fracture.

get_total_discharge()

Returns the total discharge from absolute values in the fracture.

head_from_phi(phi)

Calculates the head from the phi for the fracture.

phi_from_head(head)

Calculates the head from the phi for the fracture.

set_id(id_)

Sets the id for the fracture.

set_new_label(new_label)

Sets a new label for the fracture.

unconsolidate(fracture_struc_array, ...)

Unconsolidates the fracture from the structured array.

unconsolidate_hpc(fracture_struc_array, ...)

Unconsolidates the fracture from the structured array for HPC.
